purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the possession of a property by an individual product or activity.
A property can be associated with the following:

dt.b: the whole life of a product

dd.p: This means that an observable or measurable aspect of the whole life of a product has the property.

example.p: The product that is 'widget serial number 98/1234' lasted for 10000 load cycles. The number of cycles before breaking for the product life is a measurable aspect that has the value '10000 load cycles to break'.

dd.p: A properties that does not change during the life of a product can be treated in the same way.

example.p: The product that is 'widget serial number 98/1234' has 5 bolt holes. The number of bolt holes is a measurable aspect that has the value '5 bolt holes'.

dt.b: a state during the life of a product

dd.p: This means that an observable or measurable aspect of a product in a state has the property.

example.p: The product that is 'widget serial number 98/1234' has a mass of 10 Kg in its as-delivered state. The mass is a measurable aspect of the state 'widget serial number 98/1234 as delivered'.

The product that is 'widget serial number 98/1234' has a temperature that varies from point to point within the body of the product at maximum power on 1999-05-07. The temperature distribution is a measurable aspect of the state 'widget serial number 98/1234 at maximum power on 1999-05-07'.

dt.b: an activity during the life of a product

dd.p: This means that an observable or measurable aspect of a whole activity performed by a product has the property.

example.p: The product that is 'widget serial number 98/1234' pumps 1000 tonnes of water during its pumping activity on 1999-05-07. The mass of water pumped is a measurable aspect of the activity 'widget serial number 98/1234 pumping during 1999-05-07'.

The product that is 'widget serial number 98/1234' has a temperature that varies from point to point within the body of the product and from time to time during its pumping activity on 1999-05-07. The time varying temperature distribution is a measurable aspect of the activity 'widget serial number 98/1234 pumping during 1999-05-07'.

li.p: the possession of a property by the whole life of an individual product;
the possession of a property by a state in the life of an individual product;
the possession of a property by an individual activity.
a property condition for a class of physical individual;

note.p: A property condition for a class of physical individual is within the scope of the Property_condition application module.

li.p: the specification of an independent property definition, which may be possessed by a physical individual;

note.p: An independent property definition is within the scope of the Independent_property_definition application module.

li.p: the identification of an independent property definition with respect to a unit of measure.

note.p: The identification of an independent property definition with respect to a unit of measure is within the scope of the Property_identification application module.

uof.name: Possession_of_property
uof.description: The Possession_of_property UoF specifies the classification of an individual product or activity as a member of the class that is an independent property definition.
